articles.description: Scientists believe that the next time someone recovers from an infection, the immune system works quickly and effectively to prevent re-infection.Healthy patients in the corona have the ability to fight
articles.content: Healthy patients in the corona have the ability to fight new strains of the virus. A U.S. study has found that people recovering from an epidemic are protected from new strains of the coronavirus for… [+1545 chars]
